website_summaries.verdict: The SOL Republic Relays Sport Wireless delivers solid audio performance and is one of the more affordable exercise-focused Bluetooth earphone pairs we've tested.
pros: Powerful audio performance with sculpted lows and highs
cons: No included pouch to store earphones in
Audio is wildly sculpted, and not for anyone seeking an accurate mix

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great fit.
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones, they're the only ones I've found that actually stay in my ears, even when walking and running and sleeping, these don't slip, they're also the longest lasting pair Ive ever had, I put my headphones through rigorous use, so they tend to break easily, but these ones can with stand how poorly I treat them! The sound quality is also great, they may be even the clearest and most bass rich headphones I've ever owned as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Leyva

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good - not outstanding.
customer_reviews.text: They're pretty good. They do fit and feel more solid than regular earbuds, but I got the version with the in-line mic, which is a large and relatively heavy attachment to the cord. The in-line mic part makes the cord on that side heavy, and it bounces when running or jumping which causes a noise and pulls on the earbud on that side. I have done high intensity workouts with these (like burpies, squat jumps etc) and they stay in. But I've also done runs where they keep moving and I have to keep pushing them in. So at least for me, they have been better than "non-sport" earbuds, but are certainly not perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I was sick and tired of the Apple ear buds popping out over and over. I hunted for a pair that would stay in place, sounded good, and let me enjoy my run/walk without getting annoyed fixing my ears...AGAIN. Although a bit pricey, the Sol Republic single button ear buds lived up to my expectations, and didn't budge until I took them out. I would recommend them, and I am actually getting another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Hoovie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic until they broke :(
customer_reviews.text: These were really the best earbuds I've ever owned -- and I tried out some by Bose previously. Bose ones don't fit in your ear right (at least not for me), these fit and stick. The sound quality isn't like a theatre, but it's better than normal cheap earbuds. Sadly, I'm in my third or fourth month and they broke. One earpiece just stopped working, and one time I was told people couldn't hear me when I used the microphone. Sol Republic, please fix this! You have a great product otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones for running!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only headphones that stay in my ear while I run even on long runs with sweaty ears. They are my favorite. Over time the wires started to show near the ends, but they always lasted a long time for me. Never had one or the other side stop working, which says a lot because on my runs the ear buds were exposed to moisture. If you need a good working out headphone I recommend these. They do have some noise cancelling but not completely. For safety it gives you just enough to hear your surroundings but can turn up the volume to help block out sound.
customer_reviews.author: stephen incledon

customer_reviews.title: Sound is pretty solid in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint about these is that they start to hurt after prolonged use, but for light use of jogging, these will stay in your ears, which has been one of the prime problems I have with In-ear headphones. Sound is pretty solid in my opinion, its not a premium experience of course, but for being able to hear the music and somewhat drown out the sound around you, these will do the trick just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Trajon

customer_reviews.title: I love Sol Republic headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love Sol Republic headphones. This is my second pair of the Relay Sports, thanks to my cat. For me, they're fantastic. Low profile in my ear, great fit and great sound. My listening ranges from podcasts, older R&B, alt/indie, acoustic and dubstep.i have yet to have a bad listening experience.
customer_reviews.author: RamenBear

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase!!! I used them for the LA Marathon and they didn't fall off. They worked wonderfully and thanks to the music, it kept me moving. Comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: @yesenialoveshiking

customer_reviews.title: The first ones lasted nearly 2 years (which is pretty long for such inexpensive headphones)
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second set of these. The first ones lasted nearly 2 years (which is pretty long for such inexpensive headphones). I've run probably around a few hundred miles with these and they've never once fallen out of my ears. They also seem pretty sweat resistant. The sound quality is not the best, but it's better than any skullcandy or comparable inexpensive headphones. Overall, and excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nate H.

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these with a group of 4 headphones looking for a new set of gym headphones. These are good but not great the sound quality is very good but not great. Stay in my ears very well. They arent my favorite of the four pairs tho. The sound range isn't quite as good as another pair I bought with the group. But, as I said in the other reviews lows mids and highs all depend on the type of music that you listen to and at the gym I listen to eighties metal. I am afterall a child of the 80s
customer_reviews.author: Phillip N. Belt

customer_reviews.title: 2 order, both junk.
customer_reviews.text: When I first ordered these, out of the box the sound was screwed up. It was as if the left earbud was emitting softer sound than the right earbud. It was so bad that I decided to return them. The second pair was still not perfect, but definitely is better working condition. However, one month later, the left earbud has cut out sound again which has rendered the pair useless. I really like the design of these buds, but the quality is just garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great for running as they do not slip. They are pretty good at canceling out external noise to the point where my husband has to give me a signal he wants to talk to me while I have them in because I can't hear him well even with the music paused.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as "SOL REPUBLIC 1132-31 Relays 1-Button In-Ear Headphones - Black"
customer_reviews.text: I've owned two pairs of Relays before, and am astounded at how low the quality of these pair are. My first two were the "SOL REPUBLIC 1132-31 Relays 1-Button In-Ear Headphones - Black" which have beautiful base response, great mids, and clear trebles. These are absolute garbage. No bass, washed out mids, and tinny treble. The only reason I got these were because my current pair went through a wash and dry cycle; the cords are all wonky from the dry cycle (the headphones themselves work great even after a wash). I will be returning this pair.
customer_reviews.author: Arifin

customer_reviews.title: Random volume fluctuations / random voice activation causes a headache.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are fantastic with the sound and fit, they didn't move from my ear at all but the damned things kept giving my phone random volume fluctuations and activating voice commands randomly. This was just sitting stationary and listening to music. No movements were being made and no water had touched them. It's upsetting because they work well other than this. But it's so damn annoying and frustrating because it'll be fine for moments and then go back to constantly doing this. If it weren't for this, I would keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I loved these headphones. Now the only time I was using these for sports, was when I went running ever once and a while, rock climbing, or snowboarding so these were just my day to day. This is my second pair cause my first pair broke after about a year and half of heavy use. These will go flying around my room, my backpack, my jackets, while still coming out working just the same. I bought the three button one last time so the one button worked amazing for my android device.
customer_reviews.author: Riley Van Iwaarden

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound for price range; sub-par durability
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I had these for about 10-11 months before a wire from one of the earbuds broke loose and the entire earbud fell off. Up until then they worked great! Sound quality was what you would expect for something in this price range. I think their price has gone down since I bought them, so definitely worth a buy if you're looking for something cheap and decent. Question to SOL Republic: Do I still have remaining warranty? If so, could I get another pair of earbuds? Let me know what's possible and how to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: For Atheletes and Soundphiles
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing!! Incredible value here. For what you're paying, the sound is superb. What I like most is it's ability to stay in the ear. These are perfect for working out. If you're not sold on wireless ear buds yet, these are the next best thing.
customer_reviews.author: PikaVu

customer_reviews.title: The sound is great, overall equal from bass to treble
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great, overall equal from bass to treble...only downside was after about 6 months the jack slips out easily. It’s as if it had worn down!? I typically use my iPhone for music and thought maybe it was my phone port but I tried it on my iPod and an android phone and it slipped out easily with those devices also...
customer_reviews.author: nathon

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: After using them at work almost everyday for 3 months, the right sides's back fell off, and soon the entire right earpiece broke off, since the back was holding several pieces together. Disappointing because I had another pair before this one that had lasted maybe a year and a half before breaking. Not sure I'd repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Kropp

customer_reviews.title: For larger ears ONLY
customer_reviews.text: Extremely uncomfortable for smaller ears, even with the small tips. The rubber spongy ring really just ruins everything. The sound quality was above average, but the uncomfortable-ness really ruined everything.
customer_reviews.author: Do you think I give a heck

customer_reviews.title: No bass only amazing QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: People listen...they have no bass but still amazing quality, they are meant for you to be running and not falling off, they have no bass since you wouldnt be able to feel it when you run anyways... it comes with different ear tips wich is so helpfull to find you size
customer_reviews.author: Francisco .s

customer_reviews.title: Great, great fit and excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: I love how these stay in my ear, so much better than so many other earbuds I have tried. There's a nice full audio response range as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Roy

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and light.
customer_reviews.text: These have been my fav headphones for so long. Light and comfy in the ears. Great sound for what I listen to and can hear.
customer_reviews.author: TOR

customer_reviews.title: Headphones have a very short lifespan
customer_reviews.text: It has been just three months and they are already unusable. The button that answers calls, plays/pauses, skips, etc. will randomly and unexpectedly hold itself down and skip, pause, or call siri at the most inopportune times, and repeatedly. It will also hang up the phone on you. Very disappointed given the price I paid for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase for people who want to use at gym
customer_reviews.text: Not sweat resistant. Purchased these because of the good reviews about sound quality and the fact the are built for working out, but they only lasted a few weeks before they started malfunctioning. When they get wet from sweat, they automatically turn volume off, and cause phone to stop playing music. So annoying. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christian M

customer_reviews.title: Still the best sound out there
customer_reviews.text: Still the best sound out there. My 1st pair? STOLEN My 2nd pair? Cat destroyed them. THIS PAIR? The sound is awesome BUT??? The volume changes randomly and there is the occasional crackle. It does this on both my iPhone and iPod
customer_reviews.author: Capt Sizzlepants

customer_reviews.title: Best earbuds I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best earbuds I've ever used. Fit perfectly and came with different ear size rubber bits. The sound quality is phenomenal and I honestly ended up preferring these to my $150 studio headphones (ATH M50s). The bass also packs an awesome punch so if you like that, these earbuds are exactly what you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Rosenow

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good. Fit in ear is good. And, so far its holding up to sweat. Real test is a nice humid day in the woods running, which is why only 4 stars. Until I can put them to the ultimate test
customer_reviews.author: Paul C

customer_reviews.title: Worst thing is the extremely grippy material they used for ...
customer_reviews.text: Bass isn't anything special unless you use the larger noise cancelling earbuds, highs are a bit to bright but acceptable. Worst thing is the extremely grippy material they used for the wires that will snag and feels like it'll break under a tug and never fails to always tangle. I bought these because I thought thr design was unique but these drawbacks aren't worth it for me :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product but missing the volume button.
customer_reviews.text: Love them but the volume control isn’t on this pair.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Reeve

customer_reviews.title: I hate them cuz he can't hear me at all
customer_reviews.text: Husband likes these. I hate them cuz he can't hear me at all :) They are too big for my ears but work well for his. Microphone must be good because he was talking to his BF while vacuuming!
customer_reviews.author: daylingrace

customer_reviews.title: I loved their headphones
customer_reviews.text: I loved their headphones, so I figured these were worth a shot. Unfortunately the headphone jack didn't connect consistently, causing me to lose audio during phone calls. Couldn't live with that.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Bought these as a gift and they were extremely happy with them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift and they were extremely happy with them. They stay in their ears during intense workouts.
customer_reviews.author: S. Harper

customer_reviews.title: Mids and highs were probably fine, but need some balance so returned
customer_reviews.text: No bass whatsoever. Mids and highs were probably fine, but need some balance so returned.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bartel

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. I had to trim some of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. I had to trim some of the plastic support around the ear-piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Please replace my headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in February, and it's no longer working. Physically, it's in perfect condition, but over time I slowly started to lose sound through no fault of my own. Now the sound is all static. I would like a replacement if possible. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: making them very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Fit in my ear without falling out and they are low profile, making them very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Broke after minimal use
customer_reviews.text: I only had these for 2 weeks and ran with them maybe 4 times before one side stopped working. Very unsatisfied, would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Sound is less than great. Based off reviews maybe a bad pair
customer_reviews.text: Dont fit ears well. Sound is less than great. Based off reviews maybe a bad pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Turrible, turrible, turrible
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Sound was less than mediocre, bass average, fit poor, and one headphone stopped working the first day of use.
customer_reviews.author: Matios Tegegne

customer_reviews.title: the sound is good, but needs more base
customer_reviews.text: They fit well, the sound is good, but needs more base. Run with them and they stay in. Decent product for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound and easy to place it right in ear
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound and easy to place it right in ear. Sometimes, the headphone don't rest properly but not with those. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Minter

customer_reviews.title: The design is comfortable. The cable is chip
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is below disappointing. The design is comfortable. The cable is chip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These were great up until they stopped working a few weeks ago
customer_reviews.text: These were great up until they stopped working a few weeks ago. I have been trying to work with SR to get replacements because they are still under warranty and they won't even return a call or respond to email. Sol Sucks, stay away!
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bass and sound quality even if you are music addict
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good earbuds, i run with them all the time very durable. very good sounds and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Itsau

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice for running
customer_reviews.text: Not a good choice for running. Pops out after 5 strides no matter which insert is used.
customer_reviews.author: HLH

customer_reviews.title: sound quality is not perfect but good
customer_reviews.text: Stay in place very well on long runs, sound quality is not perfect but good enough
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packaging Cost More than Product
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking packaging but over priced for actual product has little and almost no bass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Undecided on reliability
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit of these ear buds. I am concerned about the switch on the cord. It did not work after 2 weeks. Now, sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn't. So, do I return them now before my 30 day policy or take my chances? 3 months and left ear sound is crackling and does not work. For $50 I want head phones to last longwer. So Bummed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne V.

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: The clarity of the sound is terrible! Not a good choice if you want to listen podcast or classical music.
customer_reviews.author: Bricquebec

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are wonderful. They fit perfectly in my ears with no ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are wonderful. They fit perfectly in my ears with no awkward space and a perfect seal to let me hear my music well and keep surrounding sound out. I have zero issues with them falling out or coming loose when I run. The sound quality is great too - good, solid bass and decent mids and highs. I waited to write this review until after I had these headphones for a few months. The quality is great and I don't have any complaints. My boyfriend even sent them through the washer in a pocket of one of my jackets and after letting them dry, they worked just as well as they always have. Great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Overall good value.
customer_reviews.text: Audio is decent for such small earbuds. My ears get a little sore for long periods, but I can tolerate it - I've never taken them out because I was sore. The microphone works well enough too. I think it's in the right price range for value.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Got most of it. But not all of it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and got the headphones, but not the extra ear tips. The headphones became too tight and did not allow oxygen flow and could not hear anything when I was listing to music or other sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had a set for a year+ and loved them. The audio quality is very good
customer_reviews.text: I had a set for a year+ and loved them. The audio quality is very good, they are clear and have plenty of base. They stay in my ears as I jog and bike. As well as pick up very little wind noise as I am biking. My cat ate my first set so, I bought another set to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B

customer_reviews.title: These head phones are awesome! They are noise cancelling and do not move ...
customer_reviews.text: These head phones are awesome! They are noise cancelling and do not move it you are working out. I will definitely buy these again for a back up pair of head phones!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Stroud

customer_reviews.title: These break within a month
customer_reviews.text: I got two pairs of these. The first broke within a month, so I ordered a replacement. The replacement also broke within a month. I was happy with these while they were working, but am now very unimpressed with the quality. I could forgive one pair breaking, but two? Pretty terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the price they are the best headsets I've used
customer_reviews.text: I use these 3-4 times a week. For the price they are the best headsets I've used. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Josue Alomar

customer_reviews.title: These are almost the perfect workout earbuds
customer_reviews.text: These are almost the perfect workout earbuds. For the price they are fantastic: they don't care about sweat and they won't fall out.
customer_reviews.author: om3n

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones...If you don't Sweat
customer_reviews.text: I'm very big into running and I sweat probably more than the average person. I purchased these headphones specifically for running based on their water resistant claims and that they're so lightweight that they don't fall out of your ear. Well, the headphones worked as advertised for about 6 weeks before one side stopped producing sound. But for their inability to withstand sweat, they were great headphones. However, if you sweat at all, I'm not sure these will stand the test of any time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Forst

customer_reviews.title: The headphone was nice, but I'm kinda regret of buying it.
customer_reviews.text: First, the quality of the headphone is okay. Bass is not deep,unless you activated EQ. I as shocked when I opened the box. It was totally different with normal Relays, that's why they keep the price low as $49.90. It fits my ear but the FreeFlex like don't work with my ear very well. I feel a bit uncomfortable when I put it my my ear for a long time. Overall, if you're looking for better sound quality sports earphones, this might not what you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kwangnam

customer_reviews.title: flexible wheel that holds them in place works great, better than Apple
customer_reviews.text: These headphones stay in my ears, which is much more than I can say for the 4 other pair sitting in a drawer now. The circular, flexible wheel that holds them in place works great, better than Apple, Samsung, YurBudz, and several others I have tried. I actually have to pull my earlobe up to let them loose. And the tips allow you to hear more or less of the outside world depending size and how hard you shove them in your ear. My only gripe is the mic gets caught on the collars of some shirts and actually restricts your movement. The sleeve holding the mic should be more streamlined and less squared so it doesn't catch on things.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Just two weeks after opening, and not even with ...
customer_reviews.text: Just two weeks after opening, and not even with daily use, these buds fell apart. I would expect a longer life from ear buds at $30.
customer_reviews.author: Pruning Princesses

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Soundmagic was cheaper and better. The only upside is that it does not fall of very easily.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Sound wasn't as rich as I expected. You get ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound wasn't as rich as I expected. You get what you pay for and I wish I had bought a higher end headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Sichel

customer_reviews.title: work great, stay in ears nicely while running
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, work great, stay in ears nicely while running.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wallis

customer_reviews.title: Fits great- absolutely abysmal sound
customer_reviews.text: I actually returned the first pair of these I got from Amazon, thinking the bass was faulty and got horrible static when the volume exceeded an average level. I received my new pair immediately (thanks Amazon!) but besides the static being fixed, these things have the worst sound you can imagine. The stock apple headphones blow these out of the water. There is virtually no bass at all, and the treble is so high it gives me a headache. I finally tossed them. It's such a shame because Sol Republic typically makes great products...these fit perfectly but the sound is so bad I just can't stick with them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Reccomended
customer_reviews.text: Be ware. The end tips sometimes get pulled off and stuck in your ear and the sound quality isn't near as good as the jax
customer_reviews.author: Teegan Heiniger

customer_reviews.title: these were terrible. I have had other Sol Republic items in ...
customer_reviews.text: Actually, these were terrible. I have had other Sol Republic items in the past and they were great but I'm returning these. I went out to target and bought a cheaper brand and they work so much better than these. Dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Thede

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for work and workouts. Fits perfectly without sticking out too much. Only wish it had volume buttons on it, other than that worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: SOL REPUBLIC Relays Sport Wired 1-Button In-Ear Headphones, Android Compatible, Secure Fit For Workouts, Won't Fall Out, In-Ear Noise Isolation, 4 Ear Tip Sizes, Great For Calls, 1152-31 Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackRelays won’t fall out. FreeFlex secure fit is simple to use. Adapts to any ear size without the need for complicated parts or ear hooks. Tuned for Workouts. Great music through great sounding headphones is like sonic energy. Noise isolating in-ear speakers with powerful rich bass and clear vocals delivers all the emotion of your favorite workout songs. Ultra slim fit design rests comfortably in the ear even for long workouts. In-ear noise isolation. In-ear tips seal the ear, blocks out outside noise, so you can hear the full sound of your music. Sweat and water-resistant. Even in the sweatiest of workouts your Relays Sport will keep your music playing. Microphone and music control. The inline microphone and remote make it easy to play/pause your music, take calls – or activate Siri or Google Assist. 3 button controls volume for Apple devices.
feature_bullets: Relays won’t fall out. FreeFlex secure fit is simple to use. Adapts to any ear size without the need for complicated parts or ear hooks

Tuned for Workouts. Great music through great sounding headphones is like sonic energy. Noise isolating in-ear speakers with powerful rich bass and clear vocals delivers all the emotion of your favorite workout songs. Ultra slim fit design rests comfortably in the ear even for long workouts
In-ear noise isolation. In-ear tips seal the ear, blocks out outside noise, so you can hear the full sound of your music
Sweat and water-resistant. Even in the sweatiest of workouts your Relays Sport will keep your music playing
Microphone and music control. The inline microphone and remote make it easy to play/pause your music, take calls – or activate Siri or Google Assist. 3 button controls volume for Apple devices

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars193 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
